Regulation Name(s): Automated fluorescence in situ hybridization (FISH) enumeration systems
Analyte(s): Hematopoietic cells stained by Giemsa, Immunohistochemistry or ISH
Specimen Type(s): Urine specimens (from subjects with transitional cell carcinoma of the bladder)
Formalin-fixed paraffin-embedded (FFPE) human breast cancer tissue specimens
Formalin-fixed paraffin-embedded (FFPE) non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) tissue specimens
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Duet™ System integrated imaging and scanning platform
Methodologies: Cell classification based on color, intensity, size, pattern, shape
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BioView Ltd. Duet™ System automated scanning and image analysis platform for detection and enumeration of cells and genetic aberrations in various tissue and cell specimen types using FISH and IHC methodologies.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in vitro diagnostic use as an aid to the pathologist in detection, classification, and counting of cells of interest in cell suspension, amniotic fluid, urine, FFPE breast and lung cancer tissue specimens using FISH, IHC, and ISH.
